text:
Empire Pharmacy Consultants, one of the leading pharmacy staffing firms in the United States, has announced the addition of an informative industry blog on their newly redesigned website: http://www.empirepharmacyconsultants.com . In an effort to provide valuable and timely pharmacy-related information that is easily accessible to clients, EPC has dedicated a section of their revamped site to serve as a reliable source of industry news and information to clients and healthcare professionals. The site renovation and blog feature will provide essential pharmacy staffing, consulting, and management information, in addition to news related to industry trends and changes that are time sensitive and potentially impactful. In addition, the site will be regularly updated to continually provide fresh insights on the latest technologies and services that are highly sought after industry wide. A continually evolving and challenging environment in the field of health care and pharmacy staffing will make this unique approach for information sharing a welcome one.
Pharmacy Staffing: Empire Pharmacy Consultants Delivers More than Just Information, They Deliver Quality Staffing Solutions for Today’s Busy Pharmacies
Pharmacy owners understand how enlisting pharmacy staffing and pharmacy consulting services can be tremendously beneficial to the success of a growing business. Enlisting a firm like EPC allows pharmacy owners to manage operational inefficiencies and staffing issues through the evaluation of the existing business without prior attachment. With more than 4 billion dollars of pharmaceuticals sold every year, the prescription drug business is nothing to take lightly.
Targeted industry recruiters like Empire Pharmacy Consultants are driving the future of this industry’s success by providing highly talented and sought after health care candidates via pharmacy staffing services to clients. EPC, founded and operated by pharmacists, also specializes in pharmacy consulting and provides management services to assist clients with improving their medication distribution systems, the design and implementation of new pharmacy workflow patterns, reducing medication dispensing and administration errors, and incorporating new computer and information systems. As the numbers indicate, success is out there. Partnering with experts at Empire Pharmacy Consultants can help pharmacy owners achieve goals in this fast paced sector.

Who do companies trust for pharmacy staffing when they need to fill the positions that matter most?
